summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD FUSION. WHILE PARKED, THE VEHICLE ROLLED AWAY. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE EMERGENCY BRAKE HAD TO BE ENGAGED TO STOP THE VEHICLE. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND STATED THAT THE VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED IN A RECALL. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 90,000.
